title: Chapter 690: The Chapter that Never Was!
content:
Chapter 690: The Chapter that Never Was!

 Note from Deathblade: Er Gen actually made a mistake when posting his chapters, and skipped from 689 directly to 691. I guess that means ISSTH is technically 1613 chapters long, not 1614!!

 Previous Chapter Next Chapter

book.title: I Shall Seal the Heavens
book.description: I Shall Seal the Heavens is the story of the young scholar Meng Hao, who gets forcibly recruited into a sect of immortal cultivators. In the cultivation world, the strong prey on the weak, and the law of the jungle prevails. Meng Hao must adapt to survive. Filled with both comedy and drama, I Shall Seal the Heavens remains one of the most beloved xianxia stories ever translated. What does it mean to “Seal the Heavens?” This is a secret that you will have to uncover along with Meng Hao!\n
